alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 4:44PM CST until February 26 at 8:43PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Residents north of columbus and near steens may need to take precautions. Several secondary roads north of columbus have water flowing over them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Luxapallila Creek Columbus 15.0 15.6 Wed 4 pm CST 18.0 16.3 12.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 7:00 PM CST.
